author: poojaranjan
content:
**EIPIP Meeting 92**
Date and Time: Oct 18, 2023 at 14:00 UTC
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/281

author: _shemnon
content: Missed the call for the RollCall L2 call.  I am disappointed about the merged website decision.  What I thought the agreement was for is two separate websites, one for EIPs and one for ERCs.  Two different top level domains, two different repos.  I'll have to watch the video to see how this decision came to be.

author: _shemnon
content: sites were notionally eip.ethereum.org, erc.ethereum.org, <wg>.ethereum.org, for example for RIPs rip.ethereum.org

author: _shemnon
content: RollCall (the L2 call) is interested in a separate rollup topic/working group.

author: lightclient
content: yeah i don't understand, we talked about this last EIPIP and I thought we already agreed on the separate website?

author: lightclient
content:
from eipip 91 https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/278#issuecomment-1747725103

> The subdomain erc.ethereum.org is ready. Just waiting to set up the correct files.

seemed pretty clear?
